description: This Python script sets up a knowledge base, an agent, and a team for interacting with the Agno framework, including loading a URL-based knowledge source and executing a test response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a role, model, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI models for vector similarity.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Manages URL-based knowledge sources and their loading.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Encapsulates a team with members, a model, knowledge base, and display options.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Provides tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types in LanceDb.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base from the URL source.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the team, optionally streaming.
